title: Kaja Grobelna
text:
Kaja Grobelna (born on January 4, 1995 in <a href="Radom">Radom</a>) is a Belgian volleyball player of Polish origin, playing as an opposite spiker. 
She played for the <a href="Belgium%20women%27s%20national%20volleyball%20team">Belgium women's national volleyball team</a>, at the <a href="2017%20FIVB%20Volleyball%20World%20Grand%20Prix">2017 FIVB Volleyball World Grand Prix</a>.
Since the 2018/2019 season, she has played for <a href="Futura%20Volley%20Busto%20Arsizio">Unet E-Work Busto Arsizio</a>.
